movies.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: A new chapter in the Planet of the Apes saga, exploring the future of apes and humanity.

movies.title: Bad Boy - Ride or Die
movies.description:
When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels,wisecracking Miami cops 
Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

movies.title: My Spy
movies.description: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl.

movies.title: The Beekeeper
movies.description:
A kind-hearted landlady commits suicide after falling victim to a phishing scam, 
leading former Beekeeper operative Adam Clay to set out on a brutal 
campaign for revenge upon those responsible.

movies.title: Mean Girls
movies.description:
Cady Heron is a hit with the Plastics, an A-list girl clique at her new school.
But everything changes when she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, 
the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

movies.title: The Garfield Movie
movies.description:
After Garfield's unexpected reunion with his long-lost father ragged alley cat Vic, 
he and his canine friend Odie are forced from their perfectly pampered lives
 to join Vic on a risky heist.

movies.title: Divorce in the Black
movies.description:
Ava's husband Dallas leaves her heartbroken as he abandons their marriage.
A dramatic exploration of the complexities and challenges faced during a high-profile divorce.

movies.title: After Everything
movies.description:
The final installment in a romantic saga. After breaking up with his true love, 
best-selling author Hardin Scott travels to Portugal in an attempt to make 
amends for his past behavior.

movies.title: Avengers End Game
movies.description:
After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. 
With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to 
reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description:
Forever alone in a crowd, failed comedian Arthur Fleck seeks connection as he walks the streets of Gotham City. 
Arthur wears two masks -the one he paints for his day job as a clown, 
and the guise he projects in a futile attempt to feel like he's part of the world around him.

movies.title: Us
movies.description:
In order to get away from their busy lives, the Wilson family takes a vacation to 
Santa Cruz, California. At night, four strangers break into Adelaide's childhood home. 
The family is shocked to find out that the intruders look like them.

movies.title: Minions: The rise of Gru
movies.description:
Minions: The Rise of Gru is an animated film that tells the untold story of a 
twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain. 
Growing up in the 1970s, Gru hatches a plan to become evil enough to 
join the supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious 61.

movies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
movies.description:
Wolverine is recovering from his injuries when he crosses paths with the loudmouth Deadpool. 
They team up to defeat a common enemy.

movies.title: Aquaman and The Lost Kingdom
movies.description:
The sequel to Aquaman (2018) follows Arthur Curry as he faces a new threat 
from Black Manta, who wields the Black Trident. He teams up with his brother Orm to 
save Atlantis and the world from destruction.

movies.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
movies.description:
Two ancient titans, Godzilla and Kong, clash in an epic battle as humans 
unravel their intertwined origins and connection to Skull Island's mysteries.

movies.title: Despicable Me 4
movies.description:
The fourth installment of the animated comedy 
franchise follows Gru and his family as they face a new villain and a new baby.
